data.name: Description
data.value: Query telemetry data from running Aspire applications.

data.name: ProjectOptionDescription
data.value: The path to the AppHost project file.

data.name: DashboardUrlOptionDescription
data.value: URL to a standalone Aspire Dashboard (e.g., http://localhost:18888). Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_URL environment variable.

data.name: ApiKeyOptionDescription
data.value: API key for Dashboard authentication. Required if Dashboard uses ApiKey auth mode. Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_API_KEY environment variable.

data.name: FieldsDescription
data.value: Discover available telemetry fields and their values.

data.name: FieldsTypeOptionDescription
data.value: Filter to show only trace or log fields. Valid values: 'traces', 'logs'.

data.name: FieldsResourceOptionDescription
data.value: Filter fields to a specific resource.

data.name: FieldsJsonOptionDescription
data.value: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

data.name: FieldsFieldNameArgumentDescription
data.value: Optional field name to get distinct values for. If omitted, lists all available fields.

data.name: FieldsNoDashboardError
data.value: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

data.name: FieldsConnectingToDashboard
data.value: Connecting to Dashboard...

data.name: FieldsQueryingFields
data.value: Querying telemetry fields...

data.name: FieldsQueryingFieldValues
data.value: Querying field values...

data.name: TracesDescription
data.value: Query distributed traces from running Aspire applications.

data.name: TracesResourceOptionDescription
data.value: Filter traces to a specific resource.

data.name: TracesFilterOptionDescription
data.value: Filter expression (e.g., 'status=Error', 'http.method=POST'). Can be specified multiple times.

data.name: TracesSearchOptionDescription
data.value: Search text to filter span names.

data.name: TracesLimitOptionDescription
data.value: Maximum number of traces to return. Default is 100.

data.name: TracesJsonOptionDescription
data.value: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

data.name: TracesTraceIdArgumentDescription
data.value: Optional trace ID to get details for a specific trace. If omitted, lists recent traces.

data.name: TracesNoDashboardError
data.value: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

data.name: LogsDescription
data.value: Query structured logs from running Aspire applications.

data.name: LogsResourceOptionDescription
data.value: Filter logs to a specific resource.

data.name: LogsTraceOptionDescription
data.value: Filter logs by trace ID.

data.name: LogsSpanOptionDescription
data.value: Filter logs by span ID.

data.name: LogsFilterOptionDescription
data.value: Filter expression (e.g., 'category~MyApp', 'message~error'). Can be specified multiple times.

data.name: LogsSeverityOptionDescription
data.value: Minimum severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.

data.name: LogsLimitOptionDescription
data.value: Maximum number of logs to return. Default is 100.

data.name: LogsJsonOptionDescription
data.value: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

data.name: LogsNoDashboardError
data.value: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

data.name: LogsInvalidSeverityError
data.value: Invalid severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.
